Class HighScoreManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.util.HighScoreManager
public class HighScoreManager extends Object
Manages high score persistence to/from a file. High scores are stored in a simple text file in the user's home directory. Implements robust error handling and atomic writes to prevent data corruption.

      public boolean saveHighScore(int score)

      Returns:
      true if the save was successful, false otherwise

      Updates the high score if the new score is higher. * @param newScore the new score to check
      Returns:
      true if the high score was updated, false otherwise

      public boolean resetHighScore()
